gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
with
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To tell someone something
pomeni nekomu z besedami posredovati obvestilo.

seg.quote: John refused to tell me her name.
He told me that he was a farmer.
‘We told a lot of lies,’ said Bill.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
tells someone something
, nekomu razkrije določeno dejstvo ali ga opozori, kaj naj naredi.

seg.quote: The design of the computer tells us nothing about such things.
Every movement they make tells you that they are tired.

sense.def:
To tell someone to do something
pomeni nekomu ukazati, svetovati ali dati navodilo, naj nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: My uncle smiled and told me not to worry.
I told her that what she needs is a good long book.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
can tell what is happening or what is true
, je sposoben pravilno oceniti, kaj se dogaja ali kaj je res.

seg.quote: You can't tell the difference between truth and fiction.
I couldn't tell what they were thinking.
So far as we can tell, it is still in perfect condition.

sense.def:
Kadar neprijetno ali utrujajoče doživetje
begins to tell
, začenja povzročati hude posledice.

seg.quote: The strain was beginning to tell.
All these late nights were beginning to tell on my health.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
time will tell
, hočemo povedati, da bo resnica o nečem znana šele čez nekaj časa.

Kadar nekdo
can tell similar people or things apart
, je sposoben prepoznati razlike med podobnimi osebami ali stvarmi.

To tell someone off
pomeni z nekom govoriti jezno ali resno, ker je naredil nekaj narobe.

seg.quote: We don't want to get told off, do we?
When she got back she would give him such a telling-off about that doll.
